title: A Science Experiment: part 2
summary:
And we’re back! As noted in part 1, there is the possibility I’ve discovered something interesting in biology. Lacking an academic peer group, I’m using a series of blog posts to gather feedback and to keep myself honest. Because chances continue to be high that as an outsider I am deluding myself.
The full backstory can be found in part 1 without which this installment will not make much sense.
